li&#123;line-height:2;color:#595959&#125;.markdown-body img.loaded&#123;margin:0 auto;display:block&#125;.markdown-body blockquote&#123;background:#fff9f9;margin:2em 0;padding:2px 20px;border-left:4px New,monospace&#125;.markdown-body pre>code&#123;font-size:12px;padding:15px 12px;margin:0;word-break:normal;display:block;overflow-x:auto;color:#333;background:#f8f8f8&#125;.markdown-body table&#123;border-collapse:collapse;margin:1rem 0;overflow-x:auto&#125;.markdown-body table td,.markdown-body table th&#123;border:1px solid #dfe2e5;padding:.6em 1em&#125;.markdown-body table tr&#123;border-top:1px solid #dfe2e5&#125;.markdown-body table tr:nth-child(2n)&#123;background-color:#f6f8fa&#125;</style><p>最近我的<code>npm</code>发抽了似的，安装各种依赖出现各种报错，直接记录一下。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">问题</h2>
<p>执行<code>npm install</code>时，控制台的部分报错：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-shell copyable" lang="shell">npm ERR! Unexpected end of JSON input while parsing near '...7839d064dd0d46cd1b88e'

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     E:\DeveloperTool\nodejs\node_cache\_logs\2021-01-04T08_02_35_882Z-debug.log
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>报错截图，如下：
<img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/fdcba52ea2d7459c81526c753810bd18~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-zoom-1.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">解决</h2>
<ol>
<li>清除<strong>缓存</strong></li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-shell copyable" lang="shell">npm cache clean --force
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>注意：清楚缓存可能需要一些时间，耐心等待~</p>
</blockquote>
<ol start="2">
<li>重新安装</li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-shell copyable" lang="shell">npm install
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/f2035963a730424289e159c1dff536a3~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-zoom-1.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">
3. 试试<code>npm run dev</code>，服务器启动成功了！</p></div>  
</div>
